R

RAND - Variable in class core_lib.Globals
A Random object seeded by this.RAND_SEED.
RAND_SEED - Variable in class core_lib.Globals
Seed that initialized the 'this.RAND' Random object herein
receiver - Variable in class core_lib.Transaction
Numerical identifier for the file receiver.
Relation - Class in core_lib
The Relation class describes the prior interaction between two users.
Relation() - Constructor for class core_lib.Relation
Construct an empty Relation object.
Relation.Copy - Enum in core_lib
The Copy enumeration differentiates between the different feedback histories which are being stored at the Relation level.
Relation.Copy() - Constructor for enum core_lib.Relation.Copy
 
reset() - Method in class core_lib.Statistics
Reset all statistical fields (integer counters) back to zero.
